General.Name: Inmax Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Inmax Holding Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells a range of fasteners primarily in the Southeast Asia region. It offers pneumatic and industrial nails; coil roofing nails for roofing, asphalt and fiberglass shingles, lathing, insulation board, vinyl siding, fiber cement roofing and siding, and waterproof tar paper applications; coil nails for use in wooden pallets and wooden boxes assembly, siding, decking, panel sheathing, and fencing; and staples for furniture and wooden box manufacturing, as well as for fastening works, such as architectural applications. The company also provides brads for use in finish, trim, drawers, and cabinets; and plastic strip and paper tape nails for framing, sheathing, sub flooring, roof decking, and exterior decks. Inmax Holding Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in George Town, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: Harbour Place, George Town, Cayman Islands, KY1-1002
